data.lyric:
[ti:Flossin' (Explicit)]
[ar:Internet Money/Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:Flossin' (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Flossin' (Explicit) - Internet Money/Youngboy Never Broke Again
[00:08.28]Lyrics by：Kentrell DeSean Gaulden
[00:16.57]Composed by：Danny Lee Snodgrass, Jr./Jabrielle Brooks/Bryce Thomas Frizzell/John Francis Mbata/Donny Flores/Travis Nelson Barker
[00:24.86]Ridin' in a Maybach flossin'
[00:26.79]
[00:27.45]Shawty with me wonderin' why I get up often
[00:30.35]High as hell don't want do no talking
[00:33.28]And tell them n***as that they better approach with caution
[00:35.65]Hold that love around me this s**t bring hatred out me
[00:38.98]Scarred from love on these d**gs got my world cloudy
[00:41.86]I was hiding in my big home don't know how they found me
[00:44.67]Northside with my thugs
[00:45.71]Get hit with slugs you pull up where them rounds be
[00:47.93]Black ops all we got out here
[00:49.36]Strapped with chrome got Polo on
[00:50.85]These diamonds hit like chandeliers
[00:52.23]Hol' on jack some stores don't play on phones
[00:53.84]It can turn out soon as that first call in
[00:55.37]I just spotted one now I'm on a domе
[00:56.82]Cop my lens as soon as I first walked in
[00:58.29]
[00:59.55]I won't feel a thing for the night out
[01:01.54]
[01:02.14]Please don't hold no grudge against me
[01:04.21]I'll be gone 'fore the lights out
[01:06.27]Can you tell me right now
[01:07.68]Right now
[01:08.24]If it come down to them all going against me
[01:10.42]Just wanna know you got my back that's all
[01:12.07]Public try to take pictures I don't take interest no
[01:13.88]
[01:14.53]Get into it don't wanna talk to you 'til my feelings gone
[01:17.18]N***as wanna put me up
[01:18.35]But I been down since my friend been gone
[01:20.18]My brother my thug who got me though
[01:21.66]Hope ones who I had all along
[01:22.87]
[01:24.75]Ridin' in a Maybach flossin'
[01:27.47]Shawty with me wonderin' why I get up often
[01:30.26]High as hell don't want do no talking
[01:32.72]
[01:33.27]And tell them n***as that they better approach with caution
[01:35.84]They better proceed with caution
[01:37.36]These diamonds ain't coming up off me
[01:38.79]N***a know I tote big .40's pull up and end your party
[01:41.62]I say I can't keep these b***hes off me
[01:43.24]See them gunners they still ain't caught me
[01:44.75]Catch you round just for to find peace
[01:46.14]But you done linked to what the blogs see
[01:47.76]They know what up ain't none for to talk 'bout s**t
[01:49.14]Come pull up n***a
[01:49.85]Big sticks inside this truck ain't gotta work out
[01:51.85]If I up like a pull up n***a
[01:53.19]One two three four five six seven figures
[01:54.65]Two four six came I zipped seven n***as
[01:56.16]Hatchback liftin' up the fender
[01:57.48]Compete defeat kill all contenders where my pole
[01:59.66]
[02:00.52]I can't die you know these n***as they might try ooh
[02:02.80]
[02:03.33]So just like God I keep my fire right by my side yeah
[02:06.14]I'm driving fast happy I'm up I ain't suicidal at least right now
[02:09.33]Still gettin it in free them gang babies need 'em on side me
[02:11.70]
[02:12.41]Ridin' in a Maybach flossin'
[02:14.66]
[02:15.35]Shawty with me wonderin' why I get up often
[02:18.34]High as hell don't want do no talking
[02:21.23]And tell them n***as that they better approach with caution
[02:23.79]
[02:24.69]Ridin' in a Maybach flossin'
[02:27.37]Shawty with me wonderin' why I get up often
[02:30.02]
[02:30.57]High as hell don't want do no talking
[02:33.24]And tell them n***as that they better approach with caution
data.trans:
[ti:Flossin' (Explicit)]
[ar:Internet Money/Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:Flossin' (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:08.28]//
[00:16.57]//
[00:24.86]开着迈巴赫驰骋 肆意炫耀
[00:26.79]
[00:27.45]我身边的妹子不禁好奇我时常斗志激昂原因
[00:30.35]嗨到不能自已 不想多说一句废话
[00:33.28]告诉这些家伙 他们最好谨慎行事
[00:35.65]让爱包围着我 这些破事让我心生怨恨
[00:38.98]爱让我变得伤痕累累 沉迷于药物 让我的世界变得愁云惨雾
[00:41.86]我藏身于我的大房子里 不知道他们如何找到我的踪迹
[00:44.67]与我的兄弟一起在北方埋头苦干
[00:45.71]被子弹击中 你把车停在他们开枪的地方
[00:47.93]我们悄无声息 采取秘密行动
[00:49.36]全副武装 穿着拉夫劳伦的行头
[00:50.85]这些钻石就像吊灯一样闪闪发光
[00:52.23]稍等片刻 抢劫商店 不要玩手机
[00:53.84]等第一个电话打进来 就会知道结果
[00:55.37]我只是发现一个敌人 现在我瞄准脑袋
[00:56.82]当我第一个走进来时 将镜头瞄准
[00:58.29]
[00:59.55]夜晚时分 走出家门 我没有感到一丝开心
[01:01.54]
[01:02.14]请不要对我怀恨在心
[01:04.21]在灯光熄灭之前 我会转身离去
[01:06.27]现在你能否告诉我
[01:07.68]此时此刻
[01:08.24]如果最终他们都与我针锋相对
[01:10.42]只想知道你会成为我的坚实后盾 就是如此
[01:12.07]公众想要拍照 我没有丁点兴趣
[01:13.88]
[01:14.53]乐在其中 不想与你交谈 直到我的感觉消失殆尽
[01:17.18]哥们想让我重振旗鼓
[01:18.35]但自从我的朋友离去以后 我就意志消沉
[01:20.18]我的兄弟 我的伙伴 谁让我取得如今的成就
[01:21.66]希望那些人与我和睦相处
[01:22.87]
[01:24.75]开着迈巴赫驰骋 肆意炫耀
[01:27.47]我身边的妹子不禁好奇我时常斗志激昂原因
[01:30.26]嗨到不能自已 不想多说一句废话
[01:32.72]
[01:33.27]告诉这些家伙 他们最好谨慎行事
[01:35.84]他们最好小心行事
[01:37.36]这些钻石不会从我身上掉落
[01:38.79]大家知道我带着0.40口径的枪 停下车子 让你的派对戛然而止
[01:41.62]我说我无法让这些家伙远离我
[01:43.24]看看他们的枪手 依然无法伤我分毫
[01:44.75]把你住个正着 只是为了寻找平静
[01:46.14]博客上看到与你有关的报道 
[01:47.76]他们知道来龙去脉 没有人把真相说出口
[01:49.14]赶紧停下 哥们
[01:49.85]车里放着武器 但是无济于事
[01:51.85]如果我振作精神 奋力拼搏
[01:53.19]一 二 三 四 五 六 七位数钞票收入囊中
[01:54.65]二 四 六个人来势汹汹 我干掉七个人
[01:56.16]掀起这辆掀背车的挡板
[01:57.48]互相对抗 所向披靡 干掉所有竞争者 我的枪在哪里
[01:59.66]
[02:00.52]我不会丢掉性命 你知道这些人可能会故意挑衅
[02:02.80]
[02:03.33]所以就像上帝一样 我随身携带武器
[02:06.14]我驾车狂飙 很高兴我能振作精神 我不会自我了断 至少现在不会
[02:09.33]依然全情投入 释放那些帮派成员 我需要他们与我并肩战斗
[02:11.70]
[02:12.41]开着迈巴赫驰骋 肆意炫耀
[02:14.66]
[02:15.35]我身边的妹子不禁好奇我时常斗志激昂原因
[02:18.34]嗨到不能自已 不想多说一句废话
[02:21.23]告诉这些家伙 他们最好谨慎行事
[02:23.79]
[02:24.69]开着迈巴赫驰骋 肆意炫耀
[02:27.37]我身边的妹子不禁好奇我时常斗志激昂原因
[02:30.02]
[02:30.57]嗨到不能自已 不想多说一句废话
[02:33.24]告诉这些家伙 他们最好谨慎行事
